channel.title: Logo? not sure how to aDD
channel.description: k so i used tome's cache suite to add a diferent logo i saved and all is well but wen i load client it doesnt show up its same size as old rs one the only way is showed up on b4 i changed bakground was bcause it had it in background image how can i enable the client to use the logo in the cache i cant add logo in the background because is show up with white corners and i dont know how to make logo transparent for it to just be placed on top of the background help!
